meaningMnemonic: A <radical>drunkard</radical> who has his <radical>mouth</radical> on the <radical>ground</radical>, has a <radical>heart</radical> that is <kanji>misguided</kanji>. First of all, he tries to drink his problems away, but worse, he's so drunk he's trying to drink out of the ground.
readingMnemonic: Nowadays we don't say <kanji>misguided</kanji>, we say <reading>wack</reading> (わく). Like, damn that drunkard is so messed up, he's wack.
